text: @WhiteHouse Well done for ignoring for months about the Coronavirus coming into our country, then when it was apparently killing 10s,15,20, then 50,70,100s trump still wouldn’t acknowledge this was a pandemic getting out of control, wouldn’t send medical equipments,ventilators,testings none.
